thread.title: Sepp Blatter defiant in face of pressure from top sponsors

title: Sepp Blatter defiant in face of pressure from top sponsors
text: Sepp Blatter defiant in face of pressure from top sponsors Saturday, 3 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) Top sponsors of FIFA wants Sepp Blatter to go. Top FIFA sponsors joined forces to demand Sepp Blatter's immediate resignation, as the scandal-tainted world football chief vowed to cling to power. News24 3 hours ago - Sports Top FIFA sponsors joined forces to demand Sepp Blatter's resignation, dealing a fresh blow to the scandal-tainted world football chief even as he vowed to cling... IndiaTimes 6 hours ago - Sports Finally, we may have an answer to the question of what it will take for major sponsors to apply some pressure toward ending the miserable, corrupt reign of Sepp... Mashable 7 hours ago - Internet Sepp Blatter defied calls from Fifa sponsors Budweiser, Coca-Cola, McDonald’s and Visa to quit immediately as president of world soccer’s governing body on... S.China Morning Post 8 hours ago - Sports • Visa and Budweiser join as sponsors call for president’s removal • Blatter statement ‘respectfully disagrees’ with Coca-Cola’s position Four of... guardian.co.uk 12 hours ago - Markets You Might Like
